config.capacity.name: Capacity
config.capacity.tooltip: The carrying capacity for this chests.
config.access-carried.name: Access Carried
config.access-carried.tooltip: Open this chest inventory while it's being carried.
config.can-carry.name: Carry Chest
config.can-carry.tooltip: Carry this chest even while it's holding items.
config.craft-from-chest.name: Craft from Chest
config.craft-from-chest.tooltip: Allows chest to be crafted from remotely.
config.stash-to-chest.name: Stash to Chest
config.stash-to-chest.tooltip: Allows chest to be stashed into remotely.
config.vacuum-items.name: Vacuum Items
config.vacuum-items.tooltip: Allows chest to pick up dropped items while in player inventory.
